Joe DeGloria
============

[City Council](https://burlingtonwa.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=10)
Title: Councilmember
Phone:
360-755-0531

Current Term: January 1, 2022 - December 31, 2025

Joe DeGloria is involved in the community having served nine years on the City of Burlington Library Board of Trustees prior to his election to the City Council. He is a life-time resident of the City and graduated from Western Washington University with a B.S. degree. Joe believes in stewardship, personal responsibility, and accountability.

Joe serves on the Public Works Committee, Downtown Burlington Association. Councilmember DeGloria is Chair of the Historical Preservation Board and an alternate on the Public Safety Committee.
